authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something

realm.name: admin
realm.description: Allows user management through keycloak admin console

cosmetics-app.name: msa_user
cosmetics-app.description: Role assigned to Market Surveillance users, granting them access to all registered products, but restricting access to product formulations

cosmetics-app.name: poison_centre_user
cosmetics-app.description: Role assigned to Poison Centre users granting them access to all registered products.

cosmetics-app.name: user
cosmetics-app.description: Default role assigned to all users.

psd-app.name: team_admin
psd-app.description: Users with team-admin roles are allowed to change team memberships in psd

psd-app.name: psd_user
psd-app.description: Role granting access to the Product safety database.

psd-app.name: user
psd-app.description: Default role assigned to all users.
